headLine.subtitle: Freelance Web Developer
headLine.content: With a practical and efficient approach. Functional and efficient websites.

devinet.title: Devient
devinet.content: My role was presenting solutions and resolving them according to user preferences, always working closely with clients to ensure their needs and expectations were perfectly met.

isWolk.title: isWolk
isWolk.content: I helped maintain various websites, ensuring their optimal performance as well as adapting them to their changing needs.

MASRealEstate.title: MÁS Real Estate
MASRealEstate.content: Website dedicated to the rental, purchase and investment of luxury properties. It also has an administrative interface that allows an easy and dynamic management of the website’s content.
